name: Walking Stick
description: A small wooden pole.

name: Club
description: A small wooden club with spikes on the striking end.

name: Short Sword
description: A light blade made of fine steel.

name: Hand Axe
description: A well balanced one handed axe.

name: Broad Sword
description: A wide and sturdy blade used by fine warriors.

name: Flame Sword
description: An enchanted blade that glows with fire.

name: Erdrick's Sword
description: The legendary blade of your ancestors.

name: Clothing
description: Simple traveler's clothing that does not offer much protection.

name: Leather Armor
description: Leather armor that offers some protection.

name: Chain Mail
description: Armor made of fine steel links that offers decent protection.

name: Half Plate
description: Light steel plating that covers most of your body.

name: Full Plate
description: A suit of armor that covers your whole body.

name: Enchanted Plate
description: Enchanted plate armor that glows with myterious properties.

name: Erdrick's Armor
description: The mysterious armor of your ancestors.

name: Buckler
description: A small shield that wards off simple attacks.

name: Kite Shield
description: A large shield that wards off stronger attacks.

name: Gilded Shield
description: A beautiful shield that wards off the strongest attacks.

name: Potion
description: A strange concoction that heals you for 20-35 HP.

name: Magic Dust
description: Strange dust that brings you back home when dropped at your feet.

name: Torch
description: Illuminate dark caves throughout your travels.

name: Dragon Scale
description: This dragon scale provides you with additional protection against damage.

name: Skeleton Key
description: An odd key that seems to fit any lock it gets put in. Breaks on use.
